heading: SAT â€“ Your Gateway to U.S. Universities
subHeading: Comprehensive preparation for the Scholastic Assessment Test (SAT) for college admissions.
quickIntro: The SAT is a standardized test widely used for college admissions in the United States. Administered by the College Board, the SAT assesses mathematical, reading, and writing skills that are essential for academic success in college. A strong SAT score can enhance your college application and increase your chances of admission to competitive universities and scholarship opportunities.

infoBox.sections: Reading, Writing and Language, Math (No Calculator & Calculator)
